Method private void movePlayer(Player player, int currDieSum, boolean getBonus) this method moves a player on the game board

Parameters:
player - - a non null player who is in the game to be moved
currDieSum - - a number from 2 to 12 - how many steps should the player take
getBonus - - true if the player should get a bonus if he goes thru start. false otherwise
